Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.streams.filters

Interface SLMathFilter

  • public interface SLMathFilter
    A set of filters that uses algorithms from InputScaler that can be used as a StreamFilter.

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static IStreamFilter circular()
      Makes filter that runs each value through the circular algorithm
      static IStreamFilter circular​(double p)
      Makes filter that runs each value through the circular algorithm
      static IStreamFilter cube()
      Makes filter that cubes every value
      static IStreamFilter deadband​(double window)
      Make stream filter that deadbands values within window
      static IStreamFilter pow​(double power)
      Makes filter that raises every value to a power while keeping its sign
      static IStreamFilter square()
      Makes filter that squares every value while keeping its sign
